rule.conditionDesc: ( status in CurrentRecord != "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord = "Suspended")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>SavedRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Suspended</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run the "Request Unsuspend" wizard. (when ( status in CurrentRecord != "Suspended" AND status in SavedRecord = "Suspended"))
